reviewText:
I'm going to assume you know you like the movies or else this would be a waste of your money. I personally love superhero movies and saw this and wanted to add to my collection.

The movies come in flat dvd cases that are tucked into a box.

DareDevil:
Includes movie and the following special features:
Directors cut extended movie version
Full length audio commentary
All-new Featurette: Giving the Devil his due-- The making of Daredevil Directors cut

Elektra:
Includes movie and the following special feature:
Deleted scenes
The making of Elektra Featurette
Inside the Editing room featurettes
Jennifer Garner's comic-con presentation

X-men
Includes movie and the following special features:
Deleted scenes
Charlie Rose interview
Mutant watch featurette
Hugh Jackman screen test
storyboards
art gallery
animatic
theater trailers and tv spots

Fantastic 4:
Includes movie and the following special features:
X3 hosted by marvel guru
full length audio commentary
fantastic four video diary
deleted scenes
making of fantastic four featurette
Casting session and Making a scene
Music videos
theater teaser and trailer

All in all a full collection with most of the features of the full dvds.
Your call.
